actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-874.

official_title: A resolution providing for consideration of Senate amendments to (H.R. 4616) to amend the Surface Transportation Assistance Act of 1982 to require States to use at least 8 per centum of their highway safety apportionments for developing and implementing comprehensive programs concerning the use of child restraint systems in motor vehicles, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of the Senate amendments to H.R. 4616 (highway safety programs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for consideration of Senate amendments to (H.R. 4616) to amend the Surface Transportation Assistance Act of 1982 to require States to use at least 8 per centum of their highway safety apportionments for developing and implementing comprehensive programs concerning the use of child restraint systems in motor vehicles, and for other purposes.
